<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sanguine Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1964)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You gain greatly increased blood production, filtering out contagions and boosting your endurance but causing your body to bloat with blood.

 **Benefit** You gain an item bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves. This bonus improves when you attempt a save against an effect that has the [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) trait, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) trait, or would give you the [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) condition.

 **Drawback** Whenever you take piercing or slashing damage, you take 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sanguine Mutagen (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +1 (or +2 against disease, poison, or fatigued), and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sanguine Mutagen (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2 (or +3 against disease, poison, or fatigued), and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sanguine Mutagen (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3 (or +4 against disease, poison, or fatigued), and the duration is 1 hour. When you roll a success on a save against a disease, poison, or effect that would give you the fatigued condition, you get a critical success instead.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sanguine Mutagen (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +4, and the duration is 1 hour. When you roll a success on a save against a disease, poison, or effect that would give you the fatigued condition, you get a critical success instead and your critical failures on such saves become failures instead.
name: Sanguine Mutagen (Greater)
